item.title: Classic French Toast Platter
item.description: 2 slices of toast dusted with powdered sugar, served with syrup and scrambled eggs.

item.title: TT's Supreme Breakfast Platter
item.description: (Served with 1-egg omelette) 1 pancake of your choice, 1 waffle of your choice, 2 omelettes of your choice (4 toppings maximum per omelette), 2 crispy turkey bacon, saut√©ed sausages, and 3 slices of toast.
